de.linearbits.newtonraphson

Class PolyGamma

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.linearbits.newtonraphson.PolyGamma

  • public class PolyGamma
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class containing approximations for the digamma and trigamma functions.

    • Method Detail

      • digamma

        public static double digamma(double x)
        Approximates the digamma function. Java port of the "The Lightspeed Matlab toolbox" version 2.7 by Tom Minka see: http://research.microsoft.com/en-us/um/people/minka/software/lightspeed/
        Parameters:
        x - input value
        Returns:
        approximation of digamma for x

      • trigamma

        public static double trigamma(double x)
        Approximates the trigamma function. Java port of the "The Lightspeed Matlab toolbox" version 2.7 by Tom Minka see: http://research.microsoft.com/en-us/um/people/minka/software/lightspeed/
        Parameters:
        x - input value
        Returns:
        approximation of trigamma for x
